findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: Using OpenZeppelin's libraries with vulnerabilities, specifically version 4.2.0 which has a non-last update version.

findings.title: Logical issue in PYieldToken.sol#L165-L171 and AutoYieldApe.sol#L370-L382
findings.description: Potential logical issue in _updateUserIndex function of PYieldToken and AutoYieldApe contracts, related to updating user lock fee amount and charging fees.

findings.title: Usage of deprecated function safeApprove()
findings.description: The usage of `safeApprove()` is discouraged due to similar issues found in IERC20-approve and it's recommended to use `safeIncreaseAllowance()` or `safeDecreaseAllowance()` instead.
